mapper.select: SELECT cfm.NUM_ID num_model_id ,cfm.VC_MODEL_NAME ,cfs.NUM_ID num_school_id ,cfs.VC_SCHOOL_NAME ,ct.NUM_ID num_clouth_type_id ,ct.VC_CTYPE_NAME ,pc.category_id ,pc.category_name ,pi.product_id ,pi.product_name ,pi.product_url ,pi.num_product_price ,pi.publish_status ,pi.descript ,pi.introduction ,pi.pic_url from product_info pi LEFT JOIN cl_fn_model cfm ON pi.num_model_id = cfm.NUM_ID LEFT JOIN cl_fn_school cfs ON pi.num_school_id = cfs.NUM_ID left JOIN clothing_type ct on pi.num_clouth_type_id = ct.NUM_ID LEFT JOIN product_category pc ON pi.category_id = pc.category_id WHERE pi.NUM_IS_DEL = 1

SELECT pi.product_name ,pc.category_name ,ct.VC_CTYPE_NAME ,cfs.VC_SCHOOL_NAME ,cfm.VC_MODEL_NAME ,pi.product_url ,pi.pic_url ,pi.num_product_price ,pi.introduction ,pi.descript ,pi.product_id from product_info pi LEFT JOIN product_category pc ON pi.category_id = pc.category_id LEFT JOIN clothing_type ct ON pi.num_clouth_type_id = ct.NUM_ID LEFT JOIN cl_fn_school cfs ON pi.num_school_id = cfs.NUM_ID LEFT JOIN cl_fn_model cfm ON pi.num_model_id = cfm.NUM_ID WHERE pi.publish_status = 1 AND pc.category_id = 1 ORDER BY pi.num_state DESC
